message: There are lots of anime series i like, but if i need to choose only one, the winner is "Bleach". I love long animes and "Bleach" is very interesting to me in all aspects.

It is impossible to pick a single favorite. GitS SAC is the show I could watch over and over and not tire of, sub or dub. The writing is fantastic, the artwork is amazing, and its not about a bunch of whiny kids in school.
Modoka Magica is the best show out now (hope it can keep it up to the end unlike most)
@ghostking school of the dead and it's hot a lol icchi in it
Naruto and school of the dead.  Naruto for action and same for
@zergling This is a good answer. It always worries me when someone says Naruto or Bleach are their favorite anime, it just makes me think they obviously haven't seen much other anime.
Personally some of my favorites are Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei, Bakemonogatari, Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt and Evangelion. Can you tell I love Shaft and Gainax?
Fullmetal Alchemist, Trigun, Deathnote, Hellsing Ultimate, Soul Eater...
I hav too many favs but the newest 1 is axis powers hetalia
